verbs.description: In the aftermath of a [ARG1: Trump] - [V: loving] [ARG0: tweetstorm] , West dragged another famous friend into his social media dumpster fire : singer John Legend .
[ARGM-TMP: In the aftermath of a Trump - loving tweetstorm] , [ARG0: West] [V: dragged] [ARG1: another famous friend] [ARG2: into his social media dumpster fire] : [C-ARG1: singer John Legend] .
